sentence.Network_en: The Wall Street Journal uses 220,000 metric tons of newsprint each year.
sentence.Network_cn: 《华尔街日报》每年用去22万公吨新闻纸。

sentence.Network_en: We are gradually changing over to a completely metric system.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们正逐渐过渡到完全使用公制。

sentence.Network_en: The Customs Service seized 27.2 metric tons of cocaine in 1986.
sentence.Network_cn: 1986年海关截获了27.2公吨的可卡因。

list.abs: ...是指一个这样一个序列、它的元素随着序数的增加而愈发靠近，更确切地说、在去掉有限个元素后、可以使得余下的元素中任何两点间的距离的最大值不超过任意给定的正的常数，柯西列是以数学家奥古斯丁·路易·柯西的名字命名的，目录1简介2定义3部分性质1简介柯西列的定义依赖于距离的定义，所以只有在度量空间(metric space)中柯西列才有意义。在更一般的一致空间(uniform space)中，可以定义更为抽象的柯西滤子(Cauchy filter)和柯西网(Cauchy net)。一个重要性质是，在完备空间(

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent. (as an adjective relating to length): from French métrique, from mètre (see metre)
late 15th cent. (denoting the branch of study dealing with metre): via Latin from Greek metrikos, from metron (see metre)

encyclopedia.content: 一。Metric公制乐队 歌手：Metric——公制乐队 语种：英语 地区：加拿大 流派：另类摇滚/Alternative Rock 独立摇滚/Indie Rock 唱片公司：Last Gang Records 在SLSK里意外发现的真实存在的那支地下乐队Metric2005最新的专辑《Live it out》。据说乐队是由多伦多艺术大学学生Emily Haines（女主唱）与拥有茱莉亚音乐学院古典音乐背景的James Shaw所领军的摇滚组合，归类为朋克摇滚。我自然不清楚音乐的具体流派，只觉得非常喜欢。

entry.def: Metric means relating to the metric system.

example.ex: Around 180,000 metric tons of food aid is required...
example.tran: 需要大约18万公吨的食品援助。

example.ex: Converting metric measurements to U.S. equivalents is easy.
example.tran: 将公制计量单位换算为美制计量单位十分简单。

means.word_mean: 1. a function of a topological space that gives, for any two points in the space, a value equal to the distance between them
2. a decimal unit of measurement of the metric system (based on meters and kilograms and seconds);

sentences.sentence: "convert all the measurements to metric units"
"it is easier to work in metric"

means.word_mean: 3. a system of related measures that facilitates the quantification of some particular characteristic
1. based on the meter as a standard of measurement;

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"……的"; 2. 表名词,"人或科学"; 3. 表名词,"某种药或医学有关"

stems_affixes.word_buile: academy专科院校,研究院+ic……的→academic学院的
ascet练习+ic……的→adj.禁欲的 n.苦行者
elast+ic……的→adj.弹性的
electron电子+ic……的→adj.电子的
fan狂热者+at+ic……的→adj.狂热的,盲信的 n.狂热者

stems_affixes.value_cn: 磁的,有磁性的,有吸引力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: magnet磁体,磁铁+ic……的→adj.磁的,有磁性的,有吸引力的
metr=meter米+ic……的→adj.米制的,公制的
prosa=prose散文+ic……的→像散文一样平淡,无趣
sept感染+ic……的→adj.受感染的,腐败的
stat站+ic……的→站着的,静止的
symmetry[n.对称]+ic……的→symmetric相称性的
vitriol硫酸盐,刻薄话+ic……的→adj.刻薄的,强烈的
geography地理[学]+ic人或科学→geographic地理[学]的
an无+alg痛+es+ic药物→n.镇痛剂 adj.止痛的
psyche灵魂;精神+del看+ic某种药或医学有关→adj.引起幻觉的 n.迷幻药
sopor迷睡,昏睡,酣睡+if+ic某种药或医学有关→adj.催眠的 n.安眠药

crit评判,批评+ic人或科学→n.批评家,评论家
log说话,词语,思想+ic人或科学→说话的学问→逻辑学
mim模仿+ic人或科学→v.模仿,戏弄 n.模仿他人言行的人

sto+ic人或科学→来自古希腊斯多葛派学,主张以苦为乐
an无+alg痛+es+ic药物→n.镇痛剂 adj.止痛的
an无+esthet感觉+ic某种药或医学有关→n.麻醉剂
cathart净化+ic某种药或医学有关→n.泻药
emet呕吐+ic某种药或医学有关→n.催吐药
psyche灵魂;精神+del看+ic某种药或医学有关→adj.引起幻觉的 n.迷幻药

Sentence.sentence: Amazon plants, for instance, hold more than 100 billion metric tons of carbon, equal to 15 years of tailpipe and chimney emissions.
billion metric tons of carbon into the atmosphere each year - making forests the leading source of greenhouse gases

Each burning season in the Amazon, fires deliberately set by frontier settlers and developers hurl up almost half a billion metric tons of carbon a year, placing Brazil among the top five contributors to greenhouse gases in the world.

sentences.en: In the metric system, measurements are made in metres and liters.
sentences.cn: 在公制中, 用米和升作计量单位。

sentences.en: The metric system is fit to all of the world.

jushi.english: The metric system is fit to all of the world.
